> Such a command-line functionality currently does not exist. You fare
> better putting up a loitering Heritrix instance and from time-to-time
> post it URLs to crawl via JMX (See below provided link on remote control).

Heritrix may be over-kill for what you are needing to do.  A simpler 
solution may be to use Wget which can be easily launched at the command 
line:

 > wget --page-requisites http://foo.org/bar.html

Frank
